p: Therefore, the aim of this work was to study the effect of (i) two new regulated deficit irrigation (RDI) treatments applied during phase II (pit hardening phase) [ 19] and (ii) one sustained deficit irrigation (SDI) treatment on “Arbequina” olive oil composition and properties. olive oil quality parameters (free acidity, peroxide value, and UV absorption characteristics), antioxidant, total phenol content, fatty acid profile, volatile compounds, and descriptive sensory analysis were carried out.
